mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard_cmt iboardCmt, A.iboard, A.iuser, A.ctnt, A.created_at createdAt , B.nm writer, B.main_pic writerMainPic FROM t_board_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard} LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{row}
SELECT count(iboard_cmt) FROM t_board_cmt WHERE iboard = #{iboard}
